text: Neo Rauch (born 18 April 1960) is a German painter. His paintings show the influence of former East Germany socialist realism, and Surrealist painters like Giorgio de Chirico and Ren√© Magritte. Rauch figurative art isn't easily defined in a particular style. They have a narrative intention but in an enigmatic way. ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:German painters
title: Neo Rauch
